whyImportant.birthCertificate: Essential for identity verification and legal processes
whyImportant.insurancePolicy: Critical for claims processing and family protection
whyImportant.will: Ensures your wishes are legally documented
whyImportant.trustedFriend: Offers backup support when primary guardian is unavailable
whyImportant.bankAccount: Enables family to manage finances during difficult times
whyImportant.default: This task helps strengthen your family's protection plan

ifNotDone.birthCertificate: Delays in legal processes and identity verification
ifNotDone.insurancePolicy: Difficulties in filing claims and accessing benefits
ifNotDone.will: Your wishes may not be legally recognized
ifNotDone.spouseGuardian: No clear decision-making authority in emergencies
ifNotDone.trustedFriend: No backup support if primary guardian is unavailable
ifNotDone.bankAccount: Family may struggle to access needed funds
ifNotDone.homeProperty: Risk of asset loss or complications
ifNotDone.vehicle: Ownership transfer may be delayed or complicated
ifNotDone.childrenBeneficiaries: Children may not receive intended inheritance
ifNotDone.default: Your family may face unnecessary complications
